basic_text_iprimitive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_IPRIMITIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_IPRIMITIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_text_iprimitive.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 // archives stored as text - note these are templated on the basic
00020 // stream templates to accommodate wide (and other?) kind of characters
00021 //
00022 // Note the fact that on libraries without wide characters, ostream is
00023 // not a specialization of basic_ostream which in fact is not defined
00024 // in such cases.   So we can't use basic_ostream<IStream::char_type> but rather
00025 // use two template parameters
00026 
00027 #include <cassert>
00028 #include <locale>
00029 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00030 
00031 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00032 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00033 namespace std{ 
00034     using ::size_t; 
00035     #if ! defined(BOOST_DINKUMWARE_STDLIB) && ! defined(__SGI_STL_PORT)
00036         using ::locale;
00037     #endif
00038 } // namespace std
00039 #endif
00040 
00041 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00042 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_DINKUMWARE_STDLIB, == 1)
00043 #include <boost/archive/dinkumware.hpp>
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #include <boost/limits.hpp>
00047 #include <boost/io/ios_state.hpp>
00048 #include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00049 
00050 #include <boost/serialization/throw_exception.hpp>
00051 #include <boost/archive/archive_exception.hpp>
00052 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00053 
00054 namespace boost {
00055 namespace archive {
00056 
00067 template<class IStream>
00068 class basic_text_iprimitive
00069 {
00070 #ifndef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00071 protected:
00072 #else
00073 public:
00074 #endif
00075     IStream &is;
00076     io::ios_flags_saver flags_saver;
00077     io::ios_precision_saver precision_saver;
00078 
00079     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00080     boost::scoped_ptr<std::locale> archive_locale;
00081     io::basic_ios_locale_saver<
00082         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME IStream::char_type, BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME IStream::traits_type
00083     > locale_saver;
00084     #endif
00085 
00086     template<class T>
00087     void load(T & t)
00088     {
00089         if(is.fail())
00090             boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00091                 archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00092             );
00093         is >> t;
00094     }
00095     void load(unsigned char & t)
00096     {
00097         if(is.fail())
00098             boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00099                 archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00100             );
00101         unsigned short int i;
00102         is >> i;
00103         t = static_cast<unsigned char>(i);
00104     }
00105     void load(signed char & t)
00106     {
00107         if(is.fail())
00108             boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00109                 archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00110             );
00111         signed short int i;
00112         is >> i;
00113         t = static_cast<signed char>(i);
00114     }
00115     void load(char & t)
00116     {
00117         if(is.fail())
00118             boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00119                 archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00120             );
00121         short int i;
00122         is >> i;
00123         t = static_cast<char>(i);
00124     }
00125     #ifndef BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T
00126     void load(wchar_t & t)
00127     {
00128         if(is.fail())
00129             boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00130                 archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00131             );
00132         unsigned i;
00133         is >> i;
00134         t = static_cast<wchar_t>(i);
00135     }
00136     #endif
00137     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00138     basic_text_iprimitive(IStream  &is, bool no_codecvt);
00139     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00140     ~basic_text_iprimitive();
00141 public:
00142     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00143     load_binary(void *address, std::size_t count);
00144 };
00145 
00146 } // namespace archive
00147 } // namespace boost
00148 
00149 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pop pragmas
00150 
00151 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_IPRIMITIVE_HPP
